text: @realDonaldTrump Um, don’t you have bigger fish to fry, so to speak? #COVID19 ? #RussianBounty ? #RacismInAmerica (that’s right, you’re a racist yourself). Oh yes...deflection and gaslighting. We’re on to you. #TrumpIsNotWell #TrumpResignNow #LiarInChief
